translation.welcome.message: Industrial Automation engineer specialized in software development. I have professional experience in the development of web and WPF applications. I have more than 3 years in web development and have extensive knowledge of both Angular 2 and React frameworks. I am also experienced in project management and interacting with the client to define and align product definitions and functionalities as well as creating interact mock-ups and small visual specs. I am a meticulous and self-driven professional. I am capable not only of developing a product that works, but also one that is maintainable and extensible, which allows to give value to the business through code reuse and faster development. I speak three languages and in my free time I like to read about new technologies, play videogames and practice outdoor sports.
